entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of snow beginning overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm along the Strait. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
